name: Awesome Pea 2
description:
Awesome Pea 2 - next chapter of classic platformer game. Greedy Pea is back in game! Now even more dark dungeons, deadly traps and gold!

What you will definitely find in this game (again):
  • Pixel gameboy-style graphics (when everything is green)
  • 40+ different levels (more than 40, lesser than 42)
  • Retro soundtrack (sounds like your old computer)
